problem_text:
(A. Shalev). Let G be a finite p-group of sectional rank r, and φ an automorphism of G having exactly m fixed points. Is the derived length of G bounded by a function depending on r and m only?
E. I. Khukhro
answer: Yes, it is (A. Jaikin-Zapirain, Israel J. Math., 129 (2002), 209–220).
